<div class="fire-ques-wrapper pt-1">
    <div class="container">
        <#if (heading.getData())??>

        <#if (oneline.getData())??>

        <div id="accordion" class="custom-accordian">   
            <#if Fieldset.getSiblings()?has_content>
            <#list Fieldset.getSiblings() as curEntry>  
            <#if curEntry?index == 0>
						<#assign tabMenuShow = "show"/>
                        <#assign tabMenuAriaExpanded = "true"/>
                </#if>
            <#if curEntry?index != 0 >
                <#assign tabMenuShow = ""/>
                <#assign tabMenuAriaExpanded = "false"/>
            </#if>                             
            <div class="card">
                <div class="card-header d-flex" data-toggle="collapse" href="#faq-tab-${curEntry?index+1}" aria-expanded="${tabMenuAriaExpanded}" aria-controls="faq-tab-${curEntry?index+1}">

                </div>

</section>
<style>
.faq-disclaimer-block p{color: #8e8e8e;
    font-size: 1rem;}
.faq-disclaimer-block ul li{color: #8e8e8e;
    font-size: 1rem;}
.faq-disclaimer-block .help-text p{color: #3c3c3c;}
.help-text span{cursor:pointer}
.help-text .active svg{stroke: #7ed321;}
.help-text .down.active svg{stroke: red;}
.help-text .down {
    transform: rotateX(360deg) !important;
}
</style>
<script>
$('.help-text').on('click', 'span', function() {
    $('.help-text span.active').removeClass('active');
    $(this).addClass('active');
});
$("div[id^='tabPanel'] .faqs-wrapper .custom-accordian .card").each(function(e){
       var varibleId= e;
    $(this).children(".card-header").attr("href", "#accr" + e );
    $(this).children(".collapse").attr("id", "accr" + e );
});
</script>
